p: In this study, fresh leaves of B. striata (Thunb.) Reichb. f. were collected from solar greenhouse of Gansu Academy of Agricultural Sciences of China, located at 103.6848E, 36.1001N. The voucher specimen (No. HM1912186) was deposited at the Engineering Laboratory of Germplasm Improvement and Quality Control of Gansu Province, Lanzhou, Gansu, China. The procedure of DNA isolation, genome sequencing and data processing all were followed according to the previous research by Yan etÂ al. ( 2019).
